deviceTypes.title: Device Types Management

viewModal.title: Device Type Details
viewModal.description: View detailed information about this device type.

editModal.title: Edit Device Type
editModal.description: Edit the properties of this device type.
editModal.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description for this device type...

createModal.title: Create New Device Type
createModal.description: Create a new device type with capabilities and MQTT configuration.
createModal.namePlaceholder: e.g. CIM Heat Pump, Custom Device
createModal.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description for this device type...

deleteAlert.title: Delete Device Type
deleteAlert.description: Are you sure you want to delete the device type "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone and may affect existing devices using this type.

deviceTypes.createDeviceTypeDescription: Define a new device type with capabilities and MQTT configuration for your devices.
deviceTypes.editDeviceTypeDescription: Modify the properties, capabilities, and MQTT settings of this device type.

detailPage.title: Device Type Details
detailPage.subtitle: Device Type ID: {{id}}
detailPage.basicInformationDescription: Configure the name and description for this device type in multiple languages.
detailPage.capabilitiesDescription: Device capabilities define what actions, sensors, and settings this device type supports.
detailPage.mqttTopicsDescription: MQTT topic configuration for device communication patterns.

editors.languageHelper: Configure names and descriptions in multiple languages. English is required and serves as the fallback language.

placeholders.name: Enter device type name...
placeholders.description: Enter a description for this device type...

capabilities.editorHelper: Define device capabilities that specify what actions, triggers, and conditions this device type supports.
capabilities.noCapabilitiesDescription: Capabilities define what actions, sensors, and settings this device type supports. Click the button below to add your first capability.
capabilities.noEnumValuesDescription: Define the possible values this enum capability can have
capabilities.noBooleanLabelsDescription: Add custom labels for true/false states

mqttTopics.editorHelper: Configure MQTT communication patterns that define how devices of this type will send and receive messages.
mqttTopics.noTopicsDescription: MQTT topics define the communication patterns between your devices and the server. Set up subscription patterns to receive data and command patterns to send instructions.

placeholders.description: Describe what this topic is used for...

validation.capabilitiesWithoutId: Please provide an ID for all capabilities before saving.
validation.topicsWithoutName: Please provide a name for all MQTT topics before saving.

notifications.createdDescription: Device type "{{name}}" has been created successfully.
notifications.updatedDescription: Device type "{{name}}" has been updated successfully.
notifications.deletedDescription: Device type "{{name}}" has been deleted successfully.
notifications.errorDescription: An error occurred while processing your request.
